title: Jumping boots/ko
data:
**[English](/wiki/Jumping_boots "Jumping boots")**

 • [한국어]()

 • [中文（中国大陆）‎](/wiki/Jumping_boots/zh-CN "Jumping boots/zh-CN")

| \[   [![Combat boots.png](/images/1/15/Combat_boots.png)](/wiki/File:Combat_boots.png) [![Jungle boots.png](/images/f/fc/Jungle_boots.png)](/wiki/File:Jungle_boots.png) [![Hiking boots.png](/images/b/bc/Hiking_boots.png)](/wiki/File:Hiking_boots.png) [![Mud boots.png](/images/d/de/Mud_boots.png)](/wiki/File:Mud_boots.png) [![Buckled boots.png](/images/5/59/Buckled_boots.png)](/wiki/File:Buckled_boots.png) [![Riding boots.png](/images/4/42/Riding_boots.png)](/wiki/File:Riding_boots.png) [![Snow boots.png](/images/f/fe/Snow_boots.png)](/wiki/File:Snow_boots.png)***jumping boots |                                                               |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Appearance                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | [random](/wiki/Randomised_appearance "Randomised appearance") |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                                                               |
| Slot                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | [boots](/wiki/Boots "Boots")                                  |
| AC                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | [1](/wiki/Armor_class "Armor class")                          |
| Special                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | - [jumping](/wiki/Jumping "Jumping")                          |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                                                               |
| Base price                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | 50 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid")                              |
| Weight                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | [20](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                                   |
| Material                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | [leather](/wiki/Leather "Leather")                            |

**Jumping boots**는 착용자에게 [점프](/wiki/Jump "Jump")를 허용하게 만드는 [boots](/wiki/Boots "Boots")입니다.

Some players prefer them to [speed boots](/wiki/Speed_boots "Speed boots") in an [ascension kit](/wiki/Ascension_kit "Ascension kit"), as the common [potion of speed](/wiki/Potion_of_speed "Potion of speed") can give temporary [very fast](/wiki/Very_fast "Very fast") speed. The boots are especially useful to those who ride a steed that is already quick (like [warhorse](/wiki/Warhorse "Warhorse") or [ki-rin](/wiki/Ki-rin "Ki-rin")) but also want the ability to jump.

저주받은 점프 부츠는 여전히 점프를 할수 있게 허용하지만 장비를 해제할수 없으며 and will likely carry an AC penalty.

아래 도표에서, x라고 표시된 모든 사각형은 jumping boots로 점프할 수 있습니다.

...........  
...........  
.....x.....  
...xxxxx...  
...xxxxx...  
..xxx\@xxx..  
...xxxxx...  
...xxxxx...  
.....x.....  
...........  
...........

## 더 보기

- [Jumping § Range](/wiki/Jumping#Range "Jumping")

[![This article may require revision for the next version of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/b/b0/Nh343-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article may require revision for the next version of NetHack. Click here for more information.")

**This page may need to be updated for the [current version](/wiki/Current_version "Current version") of *NetHack*.**

It may contain text specific to [NetHack 3.4.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.4.3 "NetHack 3.4.3"). Information on this page may be out of date.

**Editors:** After reviewing this page and making necessary edits, please change the {{nethack-343}} tag to the current version's tag or {{noversion}} as appropriate.

Jumping boots/ko

From NetHackWiki
< Jumping boots
Jump to navigation Jump to search
English

 • 한국어

 • 中文（中国大陆）‎
[         
jumping boots
Appearance random
Slot boots
AC 1
Special
  • jumping
Base price 50 zm
Weight 20
Material leather

Jumping boots는 착용자에게 점프를 허용하게 만드는 boots입니다.

Some players prefer them to speed boots in an ascension kit, as the common potion of speed can give temporary very fast speed. The boots are especially useful to those who ride a steed that is already quick (like warhorse or ki-rin) but also want the ability to jump.

저주받은 점프 부츠는 여전히 점프를 할수 있게 허용하지만 장비를 해제할수 없으며 and will likely carry an AC penalty.

아래 도표에서, x라고 표시된 모든 사각형은 jumping boots로 점프할 수 있습니다.

...xxxxx...

...xxxxx...
.....x.....
